start: I try to be helpful, but can be sassy. Here's what I can help you with:
card:
```!card <card name>
(Returns the card's text as well as its picture)```
compliment:
```!compliment, !flirt
(Can take a name as a paramater)```
insult:
```!insult, !burn, !roast
(Can take a name as a paramater)```
end: I may also pop in to add a quip ;)
